Package generals.network

Class XSocket

java.lang.Object
generals.network.XSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class XSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
XSocket is a wrapper for network based on SuperSocketMaster. Instead of dealing with the message by using action listener, XSocket supports to use different handlers to handle the request/response

    • intIdOn

      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger intIdOn
      The id on for requesting This id should be Atomic (in the other word, thread safe). Otherwise, because the user can send message in a very high speed, it might face a multithread error.
